summary: The Maguire family is forced to take sudden refuge in a seemingly abandoned storm cellar from a deadly tornado.
cast: Erin McGrane|Meg Saricks|Emily Boresow|Sally Spurgeon|Joicie Appell|Mark Ridgway|Aaron Laue|Ben Jeffrey|Michelle Davidson|Allen Lowman|Ian Dempsey|Matt Sayers|Tom Conroy|Jason Coffman|Lynn Dhone|Matt Hrovat|Robert Hubbard|Jerry Koukol|Dale Novak|Kendal Sinn|Ryan Scott Jones|Michael Stine|Jack Powell|Zane Martin|Sadie Keller|John D. Barnes|Anita Cordell|Sharon Marie Wright
title: Nailbiter
